title: I got a teemo skin for the mystery gift and I am NOT HAPPY!
body:
I have been seeing the magnificent mystery gifts from Riot to the best of our players and I am truly happy for them. My problem is today I received a skin that is completely useless to me, 'Super Teemo'. Last night I received my first ban/restriction in maybe about 2 years of my 3 years of playing the game. This was a 5 minute lower priority queue and to my satisfaction I still received my mystery gift but to my misfortune it happened to be 'Super Teemo'. Now since I received this ban/restriction last night I would have preferred that I did not receive the mystery gift at all.

ThankYOU RIOT

replies.body: I got Sultan Tryndamere. I am horrible at Tryndamere, but I have no complaints because it was mystery, and Riot didn't need to give it to me.

I don't understand why you're complaining or unhappy about this "gift" or even making this thread in the first place, you got a gift, G-I-F-T "a thing given willingly to someone without payment; a present." how about we just be grateful for what we get you know some arn't even knowing when there next meal is and your here telling rito how you are unhappy you are about this gift?! even going out saying " i would have preferred that i did not recieve the mystery gift at all" man, really? .. {{champion:32}}
